text: Di hai o di hagamaaloo aga nia haganoho ala guu hihi i lodo di beebaa dela ne gida go tangada hai mee dabu aamua go Hilkiah i lodo di Hale Daumaha o Dimaadua, king Josiah ne daa mai gi daha mo Jerusalem mo tenua o Judah hagatau nia gau halahala mee mai baahi nia daangada ala ne mmade, mo nia gau hai buubuu huogodoo, mo nia balu ada god dilikai, mo nia ada balu ieidu, mo nia mee haga langaadia huogodoo o digau bouli ala e daumaha ginai.
